title: How to Make Sweet Onion Marmalade

steps.headline: Heat butter in medium heavy saucepan.
Add onions and cook for 5 minutes, stirring often.
Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of sugar and continue cooking until onions are very soft and browned.
Add vinegar, wine, raisins and simmer until almost of all the liquids have evaporated and the onion mixture is glistening and syrupy.Approximately 5 minutes.

text: Heat butter in medium heavy saucepan.  Add onions and cook for 5 minutes, stirring often.  Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of sugar and continue cooking until onions are very soft and browned. Approximately 8 to 10 additional minutes. Add vinegar, wine, raisins and simmer until almost of all the liquids have evaporated and the onion mixture is glistening and syrupy.Approximately 5 minutes.  Finished.
